title: WATCH | SAPS rubbishes claims police used vehicle for illegal dumping
text:
WATCH | SAPS rubbishes claims police used vehicle for illegal dumping

02 October, 06:55 PM

Middelburg police have rubbished claims that officers used an official vehicle to dump trash at an apparent illegal site.



Video footage of the incident, most likely taken at Klein Olifants River in Mpumalanga, has been circulating online.

Police spokesperson Brigadier Leonard Hlathi said in a statement the vehicle had been outsourced to a private panel beating company for repairs after it was involved in a collision.

"It is then that it was used by people from the private company to dump litter as seen on the video."

Hlathi said investigations showed the vehicle was used unlawfully and without consent.

A case of using a vehicle without the owner's consent has been opened.

The vehicle had since been fixed and returned to the state garage, Hlathi said.
